/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, each with its own unique architectural style. A large white building with a curved roof stands out, while a red brick building adds a touch of traditional charm to the scene. Cars and buses fill the street, indicating a busy time of day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements in Beijing.
